text: int main ( ) { int i , j , n , t , sum = 0 , k = 0 , pos = 0 ; int a [ 100 ] [ 100 ] ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { scanf ( "&d" , & n ) ; sum = 0 ; k = 0 ; a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] = - 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { for ( j = 1 ; j <= i ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] [ j ] ) ; } pos = 1 ; for ( i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ ) { sum = sum + a [ i ] [ pos ] ; if ( i != 1 && i != n ) k = k + a [ i ] [ i + 1 ] ; if ( i == n ) k = k + a [ i ] [ i ] ; if ( k > sum ) { sum = k ; pos = i + 1 ; } } printf ( "\n%d\n" , sum ) ; } return 0 ; }
